result.purpose: This folder is responsible for containing unit tests for various functionalities of the application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each test file corresponds to a specific functionality or component of the application.

tests/batch_sig_test.go.purpose: Unit test for the GetClaimRewardSig function in the RewardHandler.

tests/hash_to_addres_test.go.purpose: Unit test for converting a hash to an address using the commons package.

tests/http_parse_test.go.purpose: This file contains unit tests for parsing URLs and validating their hostnames.

tests/http_template_test.go.purpose: Tests the parsing and execution of an HTML template for HTTP responses.

tests/quest_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for streak calculation in wallet check-in logs.

tests/siwe_test.go.purpose: Contains unit tests for verifying the signature and recovery of messages in the SIWE protocol.

tests/slack_alert_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the Slack alert service functionality.

tests/utils.go.purpose: Defines a logger for testing purposes using Uber's Zap logging library.
